meanings.definition: A freestanding, open-sided structure typically found in gardens or parks.
meanings.sent1: We had a picnic under the gazeboes in the park.
meanings.sent2: The gazeboes in the garden provided a nice spot for relaxation.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels had a party in the gazeboes, munching on nuts.
meanings.sent4: The gazeboes stood like elegant sentinels in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The colorful gazeboes added charm to the park.

meanings.definition: The plural form of gazebo, referring to multiple gazebo structures.
meanings.sent1: The wedding venue had beautiful gazeboes for the ceremony.
meanings.sent2: Visitors admired the intricate designs of the gazeboes in the park.
meanings.sent3: The gazeboes seemed to gossip amongst themselves in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The gazeboes dotted the landscape like miniature castles.
meanings.sent5: Children played hide-and-seek around the gazeboes.
